    • GridSchelling

      public GridSchelling​(int size, int nbColors, int K)
      Constructor of the GridSchelling object
      Parameters:
      size - is the size of the grid within the GridSchelling object
      nbColors - is the number of colors that can represent a family in total in Schelling game
      K - is the K parameter in the Schelling game.

    • isNeighbor

      public boolean isNeighbor​(Cell currentCell, Cell neighbor)
      Method checking for a specified cell and a specified neighbor if the neighbor habitation is vacant or if the neighbor is in in the same state as the current cell
      Parameters:
      currentCell - is the cell to study
      neighbor - is the neighbor to study
      Returns:
      true if the neighbor habitation is vacant or if the neighbor is in in the same state else false
